body_html: The documentation change is now approved internally. It will be synced to GitHub soon, at which point this issue will be updated. It's always sad when bugs have to become features. I'm reminded of how the version number for TeX will become π when Knuth dies. But at least future users will be able to avoid this problem.

body: The documentation change is now approved internally. It will be synced to GitHub soon, at which point this issue will be updated. It's always sad when bugs have to become features. I'm reminded of how the version number for TeX will become π when Knuth dies. But at least future users will be able to avoid this problem.
